plot: A disgruntled man with a mound of cow dung for a head talks about various, every day items, and how they are all, in fact, worthless.
title: You Know What's Bullshit
plot_es: A disgruntled man with a mound of cow dung for a head talks about various, every day items, and how they are all, in fact, worthless.
